summary: Use this api to get basic info of item by item_id list
description: Use this api to get basic info of item by item_id list.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_item_base_info?access_token=access_token&item_id_list=%5B34001+34002%5D&need_complaint_policy=true&need_tax_info=true&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

schema.name: category_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a category.

schema.name: item_name
schema.description: Name of the item in local language.

schema.name: description
schema.description: if description_type is normal , Description information will be returned through this fieldelse description will be empty

schema.name: item_sku
schema.description: An item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

schema.name: create_time
schema.description: Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the item was created.

schema.name: update_time
schema.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of the item, such as price/stock change.

schema.name: attribute_id
schema.description: The Identify of each category.

schema.name: original_attribute_name
schema.description: The name of each attribute.

schema.name: is_mandatory
schema.description: This is to indicate whether this attribute is mandantory.

schema.name: value_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for value of this item attribute.

schema.name: original_value_name
schema.description: Value name of this item attribute.

schema.name: value_unit
schema.description: Value unit of this item attribute.

schema.name: price_info
schema.description: If the item has models, price_info will not be returned. Please get the price of each model through the get_model_list api

schema.name: currency
schema.description: The three-digit code representing the currency unit used for the item in Shopee Listings.

schema.name: original_price
schema.description: The original price of the item in the listing currency.

schema.name: current_price
schema.description: The current price of the item in the listing currency. If product under a onging promotion, current_price will be the promotion price

schema.name: inflated_price_of_original_price
schema.description: The After-tax original price of the item in the listing currency.

schema.name: inflated_price_of_current_price
schema.description: The After-tax current price of the item in the listing currency.

schema.name: sip_item_price
schema.description: The price of the item in sip.If item is for CNSC primary shop, this field will not be returned

schema.name: sip_item_price_source
schema.description: source of sip' price. ( auto or manual).If item is for CNSC SIP primary shop, this field will not be returned

schema.name: image_url_list
schema.description: List of image url.

schema.name: image_id_list
schema.description: List of image id.

schema.name: image_ratio
schema.description: Image ratio

schema.name: weight
schema.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG. If set the weight of models under this item, will return the max weight of all models during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.product.get_model_list to get the weight of models.

schema.name: dimension
schema.description: The dimension of this item. If set the dimension of models under this item, will return the dimension with largest volume calculated by height*length*width during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.product.get_model_list to get the dimension of models.

schema.name: package_length
schema.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_width
schema.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_height
schema.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: logistic_info
schema.description: The logistics list.

schema.name: logistic_id
schema.description: The identity of logistic channel.

schema.name: logistic_name
schema.description: The name of logistic.

schema.name: enabled
schema.description: Related to shopee.logistics.GetLogistics result.logistics.enabled only affect current item.

schema.name: shipping_fee
schema.description: Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

schema.name: size_id
schema.description: If specify logistic fee_type is SIZE_SELECTION size_id is required.

schema.name: is_free
schema.description: when seller chooses this option, the shipping fee of this channel on item will be set to 0. Default value is False.

schema.name: estimated_shipping_fee
schema.description: Estimated shipping fee calculated by weight. Don't exist if channel is no-integrated.

schema.name: is_pre_order
schema.description: Pre-order will be set true.

schema.name: days_to_ship
schema.description: The days to ship. Only work for pre-orde.

schema.name: wholesales
schema.description: The wholesales tier list.

schema.name: min_count
schema.description: The min count of this tier wholesale.

schema.name: max_count
schema.description: The max count of this tier wholesale.

schema.name: unit_price
schema.description: The current price of the wholesale in the listing currency.If item is in promotion, this price is useless.

schema.name: inflated_price_of_unit_price
schema.description: The After-tax Price of the wholesale show to buyer.

schema.name: condition
schema.description: Is it second-hand.

schema.name: size_chart
schema.description: Url of size chart image.

schema.name: item_status
schema.description: Enumerated type that defines the current status of the item. Applicable values: NORMAL, BANNED, UNLIST, SELLER_DELETE, SHOPEE_DELETE, REVIEWING.

schema.name: deboost
schema.description: If deboost is true, means that the item's search ranking is lowered.

schema.name: has_model
schema.description: Does it contain model.

schema.name: video_info
schema.description: Info of video list.

schema.name: video_url
schema.description: Url of video.

schema.name: thumbnail_url
schema.description: Thumbnail of video.

schema.name: duration
schema.description: Duration of video.

schema.name: brand_id
schema.description: Id of brand.

schema.name: original_brand_name
schema.description: Original name of brand.

schema.name: item_dangerous
schema.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

schema.name: gtin_code
schema.description: gtin code for br region, will return this code only item has default model Note: gtin_code = "00" means that this item is “Item without GTIN”

schema.name: size_chart_id
schema.description: id of new size chart.

schema.name: image_id_list
schema.description: Promotion image

schema.name: image_url_list
schema.description: Promiton image urls

schema.name: image_ratio
schema.description: Promotion image ratio

schema.name: brand_id
schema.description: ID of the brand.

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: ID of the model.

schema.name: year_id
schema.description: ID of the year.

schema.name: version_id
schema.description: ID of the version.

schema.name: scheduled_publish_time
schema.description: Scheduled publish time of this item.

schema.name: authorised_brand_id
schema.description: ID of authorised reseller brand.

schema.name: ssp_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for Shopee Standard Product.

schema.name: is_fulfillment_by_shopee
schema.description: return true if the item only has a default model and it is FBS model

schema.name: complaint_policy
schema.description: Complaint policy.Only returned for local PL sellers, and need_complaint_policy in request is true.

schema.name: warranty_time
schema.description: Time for a warranty claim.Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

schema.name: exclude_entrepreneur_warranty
schema.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

schema.name: complaint_address_id
schema.description: The identity of complaint address.

schema.name: additional_information
schema.description: Additional information for complaint policy

schema.name: tax_info
schema.description: Tax information

schema.name: ncm
schema.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves.(BR region) Note: ncm = "00" means that this item doesn't have a NCM.

schema.name: diff_state_cfop
schema.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice. (BR region)

schema.name: csosn
schema.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations. (BR region)

schema.name: origin
schema.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region)

schema.name: cest
schema.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) Note: cest = "00" means that this item doesn't have a CEST.

schema.name: measure_unit
schema.description: (BR region)

schema.name: invoice_option
schema.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

schema.name: vat_rate
schema.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

schema.name: hs_code
schema.description: HS Code (Only for IN region)

schema.name: tax_code
schema.description: Tax Code (Only for IN region)

schema.name: tax_type
schema.description: tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 0: no tax type 1: tax-able 2: tax-free

schema.name: pis
schema.description: Only for BR shop. PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights. PIS % - the tax applied to this product

schema.name: cofins
schema.description: Only for BR shop. COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security. COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

schema.name: icms_cst
schema.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

schema.name: pis_cofins_cst
schema.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

schema.name: federal_state_taxes
schema.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

schema.name: operation_type
schema.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

schema.name: ex_tipi
schema.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

schema.name: fci_num
schema.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

schema.name: recopi_num
schema.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

schema.name: additional_info
schema.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

schema.name: group_item_info
schema.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

schema.name: group_qtd
schema.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

schema.name: group_unit
schema.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

schema.name: group_unit_value
schema.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

schema.name: original_group_price
schema.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

schema.name: group_gtin_sscc
schema.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

schema.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
schema.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

schema.name: export_cfop
schema.description: 7101 - for sales of self-produced goods 7102 - resale of third-party goods a tax code used in Brazil to classify and identify the nature of goods or services transactions for tax purposes. This is used for goods export to other counties

schema.name: description_info
schema.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it.

schema.name: extended_description
schema.description: If description_type is extended , Description information will be returned through this field.

schema.name: field_list
schema.description: Field of extended description

schema.name: field_type
schema.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

schema.name: text
schema.description: If field_type is text, text information will be returned through this field.

schema.name: image_info
schema.description: If field_type is image, image url will be returned through this field.

schema.name: image_id
schema.description: Image id

schema.name: image_url
schema.description: Image url.

schema.name: description_type
schema.description: Type of description : values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

schema.name: stock_info_v2
schema.description: new stock object

schema.name: summary_info
schema.description: stock summary info

schema.name: total_reserved_stock
schema.description: Stock reserved for promotion. Note: For SIP P Item, will return the total reserved stock for P Item and all A Items under the P Item;

schema.name: total_available_stock
schema.description: total available stock

schema.name: seller_stock
schema.description: seller stock

schema.name: location_id
schema.description: location id

schema.name: stock
schema.description: stock in the current warehouse

schema.name: if_saleable
schema.description: To return if the stock of the location id is saleable

schema.name: shopee_stock
schema.description: shopee stock

schema.name: advance_stock
schema.description: Only for PH/VN/ID/MY local selected shops.

schema.name: sellable_advance_stock
schema.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that Seller has shipped out and is available to be used to fulfill an order.

schema.name: in_transit_advance_stock
schema.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that seller has shipped out and is still in transit and unavailable to be used to fulfill an order.

Stock should be larger than reserved stock.
